0.0: The wife of Lappidoth. That is to say, a woman of valor, zealous in her deeds as a torch afire. And this a matter of figurative language, as when it is said about a person.
0.1: She judged. On account that she was a prophet and zealous in her deeds, this elevated status came to her; thus, she was judging Israel.

1.0: Jebus, which was Jerusalem – There was a district within Jerusalem which was called Yevus and David conquered it
